name: Turbo Wade (2008) FREE PC Game
description:
Turbo Wade {release date: Jan 29 2008, size: 11.1 MB}

-DESCRIPTION UNDER CONSTRUCTION-

TURBO WADE was created out of my love for the old Nintendo Entertainment System. I made everything from the pixels all the way down to the music. One night I was playing Solomon's Key & that's where the idea for this game started. The story is a simple one. You're Wade. The bad guy is Kez. He has stolen the magical diamonds that you need to collect. 

Controls:
**Arrow Keys or Directional Pad to move** 
**Shift or first button on joystick to jump**
